SEARCH
Package ch.domizai.simplebackup

Class SimpleBackup

java.lang.Object
ch.domizai.simplebackup.SimpleBackup
public class SimpleBackup extends Object
SimpleBackup creates a backup of your project during runtime.

      public SimpleBackup omit(String... paths)

      Returns:
      this object (allows method chaining).

    • backupNow

      public boolean backupNow(String subDir)
      Copy files to a subdirectory within the destination directory. If no destination directory is set using to(String backupDir), the files will be copied to "simplebackup".
      Parameters:
      subDir - The subdirectory in the destination directory.
      Returns:
      true if all files in the list were copied, false otherwise.

    • backupNow

      public boolean backupNow()
      Copy files to a subdirectory within the destination directory. If no destination directory is set using to(String backupDir), the files will be copied to "simplebackup". The subdirectory name follows the format "yyMMddHHmmss" and is determined at backup time.
      Returns:
      true if all files in the list were copied, false otherwise.

    • getFiles

      public List<String> getFiles()
      Get the list of relative paths to the files that will be copied when calling backupNow(). This serves as a preview of the files that will be copied.
      Returns:
      A list of relative paths of files to be copied.

    • getOmittedFiles

      public List<String> getOmittedFiles()
      Get the list of relative paths to the files that will be ignored when calling backupNow(). This serves as a preview of the files that will be omitted.
      Returns:
      A list of relative paths of omitted files.

    • getIgnoredFiles

      public List<String> getIgnoredFiles()
      Get the list of relative paths to the files that will be ignored when calling backupNow(). Ignored files are files in the destination directory and files in the default ignore list DEFAULT_IGNORE.
      Returns:
      A list of relative paths of ignored files.

    • sizelimit

      public SimpleBackup sizelimit(long sizelimit)
      Set the size limit for copying files. Default is 100000L bytes. This is a safety measure to prevent copying large files by accident.
      Parameters:
      sizelimit - The size limit in bytes.
      Returns:
      this object (allows method chaining).

    • verbose

      public SimpleBackup verbose(boolean verbose)
      Set the verbose flag. True by default.
      Parameters:
      verbose - The verbose flag.
      Returns:
      this object (allows method chaining).

    • currentDateAndTime

      public static String currentDateAndTime()
      Get the current date and time using the default pattern "yyMMddHHmmss"
      Returns:
      The current date and time formatted according to the default pattern.

    • currentDateAndTime

      public static String currentDateAndTime(String pattern)
      Get the current date and time using the given pattern.
      Parameters:
      pattern - The pattern describing the date and time format.
      Returns:
      The current date and time formatted according to the pattern.

    • version

      public static String version()
      Return the version of the library.
      Returns:
      The version of the library.

    • getSize

      public long getSize()
      Returns the total size of the files to be copied when calling backupNow().
      Returns:
      The total size of the files to be copied in bytes.
